Verses: 1 moondraamnaalile Galileyaavilulla Kaanaa Oorile Oru Kaliyaanam Nadandhadhu; Yesuvin Thaayum Angeyirundhaal.
2 yesuvum Avarudaiya Seesharum Andhak Kaliyaanaththukku Azhaikkappattirundhaargal.
3 thraatcharasam Kuraivupattapodhu, Yesuvin Thaai Avarai Nokki: Avargalukku Thraatcharasam Illai Endraal.
4 adharku Yesu: Sthreeye, Enakkum Unakkum Enna, En Velai Innum Varavillai Endraar.
5 avarudaiya Thaai Velaikkaararai Nokki: Avar Ungalukku Enna Sollugiraaro, Adhinpadi Seyyungal Endraal.
6 yoodhargal Thangalai Suththigarikkum Muraimaiyinpadiye, Ovvondru Irandu Moondru Kudam Thanneer Kollaththakka Aaru Karjaadigal Ange Vaiththirundhadhu.
7 yesu Velaikkaararai Nokki: Jaadigalile Thanneer Nirappungal Endraar; Avargal Avaigalai Niraiya Nirappinaargal.
8 avar Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ippozhudhu Mondu, Pandhivisaarippukkaararidaththil Kondupongal Endraar; Avargal Konduponaargal.

9 andha Thraatcharasam Engeyirundhu Vandhadhendru Thanneerai Monda Velaikkaararukkuth Therindhadheyandri Pandhivisaarippukkaaranukkuth Theriyaadhadhinaal, Avan Thraatcharasamaai Maarina Thanneerai Rusipaarththapodhu, Manavaalanai Azhaiththu:
10 endha Manushanum Munbu Nalla Thraatcharasaththaik Koduththu, Janangal Thrupthiyadaindhapinbu, Rusi Kuraindhadhaik Koduppaan, Neero Nalla Rasaththai Idhu Varaikkum Vaiththirundheere Endraan.
11 ivvidhamaaga Yesu Indha Mudhalaam Arpudhaththai Galileyaavilulla Kaanaa Oorile Seydhu, Thammudaiya Magimaiyai Velippaduththinaar, Avarudaiya Seeshargal Avaridaththil Visuvaasam Vaiththaargal.
12 adhanpinbu Avarum Avarudaiya Thaayaarum Avarudaiya Sagodhararum Avarudaiya Seesharum Kapparnagoomukkuppoi, Ange Silanaal Thanginaargal.
13 pinbu Yoodharudaiya Paskaapandigai Sameebamaayirundhadhu; Appozhudhu Yesu Erusalemukkup Poi,
14 dhevaalayaththile Aadugal Maadugal Puraakkalaagiya Ivaigalai Virkiravargalaiyum, Kaasukkaarar Utkaarndhirukkiradhaiyum Kandu,
15 kayitrinaal Oru Savukkaiyundupanni, Avargal Yaavaraiyum Aadumaadugalaiyum Dhevaalayaththukkup Purambe Thuraththivittu, Kaasukkaararudaiya Kaasugalaik Kotti, Palagaigalaik Kavizhththuppottu,
16 puraavirkiravargalai Nokki: Ivaigalai Ivvidaththilirundhu Eduththukkondupongal; En Pidhaavin Veettai Vyaabaara Veedaakkaadhirungal Endraar.
17 appozhudhu: Ummudaiya Veettaikkuriththu Undaana Bakthivairaakkiyam Ennaip Patchiththadhu Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhai Avarudaiya Seeshargal Ninaivukoorndhaargal.
18 appozhudhu Yoodhargal Avarai Nokki: Neer Ivaigalai Seygireere, Idharku Enna Adaiyaalaththai Engalukkuk Kaanbikkireer Endru Kettaargal.
19 yesu Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Indha Aalayaththai Idiththuppodungal, Moondru Naalaikkulle Idhai Ezhuppuven Endraar.
20 appozhudhu Yoodhargal: Indha Aalayaththaik Katta Naarpaththaaru Varushamsendradhe, Neer Idhai Moondru Naalaikkulle Ezhuppuveero Endraargal.
21 avaro Thammudaiya Sareeramaagiya Aalayaththaikkuriththup Pesinaar.
22 avar Ippadi Sonnadhai Avar Mariththorilirundhezhundhapinbu Avarudaiya Seeshargal Ninaivukoorndhu, Vedhavaakkiyaththaiyum Yesu Sonna Vasanaththaiyum Visuvaasiththaargal.
23 paskaapandigaiyile Avar Erusalemilirukkaiyil, Avar Seydha Arpudhangalai Anegar Kandu, Avarudaiyanaamaththil Visuvaasam Vaiththaargal.
24 appadiyirundhum, Yesu Ellaaraiyum Arindhirundhapadiyaal, Avargalai Nambi Inangavillai.
25 manusharullaththiliruppadhai Avar Arindhirundhapadiyaal, Manusharaik Kuriththu Oruvarum Avarukku Saatchi Kodukkavendiyadhaayirukkavillai.
